title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
OB: The Code Assist feature in the software does not consider the platform-specific line endings.
EB: The Code Assist feature should take into account the platform-specific line endings, which are CR/LF.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new class
2. Add a method
3. Define a local variable for an array
4. Observe the behavior of Code Assist and how it handles line endings.
